type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.Input
type.description:
*

Attached to a task property to indicate that the property specifies some input value for the task.

* *

This annotation should be attached to the getter method or the field for the property.

* *

This will cause the task to be considered out-of-date when the property has changed. When used on a * {@link java.io.File} object that refers to a file or directory, the up-to-date check is only dependent on the * path and not the contents of the file or directory. To make it depend on the contents, use * {@link org.gradle.api.tasks.InputFile} or {@link org.gradle.api.tasks.InputDirectory} respectively.
